data.name: Data 4 Impact: A Dose of AI for Disease Prevention and Treatment
description: ⚡ Modified an existing U-Net (Convolutional Neural Network) implementation to perform blood vessel segmentation on a new database of ROP images from the Children’s Hospital of Pennsylvania
⚡ Incorporated multi-view eye imagery and different classifiers to compare and improve sensitivity and specificity metrics

data.name: Mountaintop Summer Experience: COVID-19 Syndromic Surveillance System
description: ⚡ Created a Holt-Winters model to forecast new cases of the COVID-19 outbreak for each county in Pennsylvania for incorporation into a larger statistical ensemble featuring 5 different models
⚡ Helped web scrape 2 new data sources from PA DOH to further improve the model and wrote initial draft of white paper

data.name: CSE 297: Blockchain Project
data.description: Implemented private blockchain with Merkle/Patricia tree structure, new block validation, and proof of membership/non membership

data.name: CSE 341 - Nickel Savings Bank
description: ⚡ Created a fully-fledged database system and command line interface for a mock bank with support for viewing/creating different types of loan/credit/savings accounts and making deposits/withdrawals/payments
⚡ Implemented a robust login system with different hierarchical levels of access between customers and bank administrators
